Comment: To the folks suggesting we need wait til the Chinese are begging...that we need to humiliate and humble them, I think even Don would tell you you're wrong.  A deal is an arrangement in which both sides benefit.  There is no benefit to us to humiliating the Chinese because the deal is that we WANT to be trading partners with them.  Can we position things so we CAN dictate to them?  Probably.    Is that necessarily a smart move?  With a nuclear armed country that does not have a form of government answerable to their people who has designs on being a global power such that they feel like they would be entitled to forceably take over Taiwan, the Spratleys, the territorial waters off the Philippines, etc?  No.  Keep in mind, the president is pursuing A DEAL...not a domination.  And for a country like China that takes appearances far more seriously than we do, we need to keep that very much in mind.
